com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation

Class AdobeCSDKFoundation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation.AdobeCSDKFoundation

  • public class AdobeCSDKFoundation
extends java.lang.Object
    AdobeCSDKFoundation is an object representing the version of the Creative SDK Foundation.

      • getVersion

        public static java.lang.String getVersion()
        Gets the version of the Creative SDK Foundation.
        Returns:
        the version of the Creative SDK Foundation.

      • initializeCSDKFoundation

        public static void initializeCSDKFoundation(android.content.Context appContext)
        Initialize the CSDK foundation library. This is the first call that needs to be made before using Creative SDK Foundation library. Recommended to call this method from the onCreate() method of the application. This way required credentials are available every time the application starts.
        Parameters:
        appContext - application Context.

      • initializeAppInfo

        public static void initializeAppInfo(java.lang.String appName,
                                     java.lang.String appVersion)
        Sets application details in CSDK.
        Parameters:
        appName - name of the application.
        appVersion - version of the application.
